metadata.title: CVE-2019-13767 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in media picker in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.88allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
